Text: Hey, you're not so bad looking yourself.
I'm glad to see you've finally noticed me.
Oh, my. I think I'm feeling faint. You'll be sure to catch me if I fall, right?
Flattery is underrated.  Please, do go on.
I'm at a loss for words. I guess I tend to have trouble focusing on anything when you're around.
Are you trying to steal my heart? You'll have to try a lot harder than that. Go ahead, try it.
I'm waiting for the part where I wake up and realize this is all a really, really good dream.
Hmm? I don't think I heard you. Say that again. Slower, this time. You might have to repeat it a few times, I'm pretty hard of hearing.
Wow, you're a smooth talker. Guess you're not just a [handsome:male_mc][pretty:female_mc] face.
Well, I'm not one to turn down a compliment.
How long have you been waiting to say that? Because I've been waiting to hear you say it.
Oh, so you have been noticing me after all.
Oh, I bet you say that to all of the girls who are named [girl] and look exactly like me.
I think you just made my day. Granted, it has been a pretty boring day...but still.
Laying it on pretty thick there, aren't you? It's okay, I like a heaping dose of praise.
Hey, this is fun. Next time, let's skip the small talk and just cut to the part where we flatter each other.
You know, I wouldn't mind it if you talked like that more often.
You definitely shouldn't say things like that around the other girls. I mean, you'd only say things like that to me, right?
Wow, [player], I didn't know you had it in you.
You don't know how long I've been waiting to hear that.
Hey, this is really unprofessional. Don't worry, I won't tell anyone, just as long as you keep talking to me like that.
You like to push boundaries, don't you? Well, I'm glad you did.
[girl] seems to be enjoying herself
[girl] seems to be having a good time
[girl] is beaming
[girl] is nothing but smiles
Wow, I don't know what to say.  This is really unprofessional.
...I really think I need to go.
I hope you didn't just say what I thought I heard you say.
Ugh.  Are we really doing this again?
Can you not?  Please, just stop.
I really do not appreciate remarks like that.
Why are you the way you are?
Honest question, how did you see this ending? Because I can assure you, it's not going to end well.
That didn't go well...
Looks like she's taken
It seems like she wasn't ready for that...
Apparently, she isn't interested in [men:male_mc][women:female_mc]
It looks like she's not interested in dating
An awkwardness lingers over the conversation for the next few minutes
She seems completely oblivious to your flirting attempt...
I really wish you wouldn't say things like that...
Sorry, I already have someone I'm seeing right now.
I think I should let you know, I already have a 'special someone.'
I'm flattered, but I'm really not looking to date another person right now.
Sorry, I really don't see this amounting to anything.
You're...really not my type.
Are you sure you should be saying things like that?  I mean, it doesn't bother me, but...
Oh!  Um...
Is...is it really okay for us to be talking like this?  I mean, you're a nice person, but...
Hey, you're nice and all, but I'm really not into [men:male_mc][women:female_mc].
Sorry, I'm not, ah, really into [men:male_mc][women:female_mc].  Nothing personal.
H-hey, did you notice it rained yesterday? It was really unexpected!
Well, um...
I'm sorry, I don't mean to take up too much of your time.
I appreciate the compliment, but I'm not really into [guys:male_mc][girls:female_mc].
Oh, are you...interested in me?  I feel like I should tell you, I already have a 'special someone.'
This place is really cool.  Do you come here often?
So yeah, I'm really looking forward to the next concert.
There's not much good on TV these days, is there?
Hey, did you see what happened the other day in Tohoku?
[girl] shifts uncomfortably in her seat and tries to avoid eye contact for the next few minutes
[girl] laughs politely, but it's obvious that she's uncomfortable with the advance.
[girl] continues the conversation without skipping a beat.
[girl] looks startled by what you just said.
[girl]'s face shows no visible reaction.
[girl] winces a bit.
[girl] laughs nervously, but her nervous laughter goes on for so long that it becomes awkward
[girl] laughs contemptuously.
